event: Event opens with a welcome speech and addressing of students, and a light breakfast for the hungry.
Quick intro, Wi-Fi details, “toilets and fire exits’”, rules and run through the day’s schedule.
The Reason Why We are All Here” – plus overview of the topic.
Introducing HODs and other faculty members, followed by a speech from the HOD expressing gratitude towards the students for participating.
Participants presenting the progress report of the solution
Brain storming and testing the prototype, with audience feedback.
Venue and event closes for the night
Analysing and presenting the current solution ideas for the problem
Releasing the solution prototype and pushing into GitHub
